name: Against Hell
description:
AGAINST HELL

Against Hell is meant to be a Rogue Like set in Hell where you try to save your people from devil's class.The current build is was made for the Weekly Game Jam 142 with the theme mischief. 

Currently the game features a wave based arena mode where the player has to level up him character and try to survive all Waves..

Currently the most important thing to me is feedback that can help me fix my flaws and turn this into a somewhat decent game..

Feel free to criticize and share your opinions about this.

This game was made with collaboration with https://unwishingsix120.itch.io/
